dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
[private], HBA LL.B
Barrister & Solicitor

October 2, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
Fax: [private]

Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DCMA Complaints

To Whom It May Concern:
I act on behalf of [private] a doctor residing in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, herein referred to as the "owner."

As requested under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. 512 (c)(3)) and 512 (d)(3), we are instructed to place you on notice that the Owner is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the photographs posted on the site http://samghatalia.blogspot.com/.  The copyright issues are the photographs on this site.

The blog where the copyright work is published on the sites
http://samghatalia.blogsphot.com/, http:/www.google.com, http:/blogspot.com and http://ih3.google.com

All photographs on this site are infringing the copyright work listed above, including, but not limited to the following photographs:
http://bp0.blogger.com/_Y4TieJD52A8/RiJ9i0URL01/AAAAAAAAAAAU?IX8IT8P6kzY/s1600-h/IMG_0329_1.JPG

http://bp1.blogger.com/_Y4TieJD52A8/RiJ9dEURLzI/AAAAAAAAAAM/p-kaA1nY1yI/s1600-h/IMG_0320.JPG

[page 2]
and the following images
07_10_09.jpeg
IMG_1133.jpg
IMG_1132.jpg
07_10_5.jpeg
07_10_8.jpeg

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the Infringing Material.  However, safeguard and record the I.P. address and any other information identifying of the infringing violator who posted the information on your site.

I have good faith and belief that the use of the Infringing Material is not authorized by the Owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that S.G. is the copyright owner.  I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the address, telephone number or email address indicated below:

[private]
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada [private]
email:[private]
fax:[private]
tel: [private]

Very truly yours,
[private]
Barrister & Solicitor
